DESCRIPTION: Gems can be placed into this Socket at a Rest Site to combine the Gem's effect with this card's effect.

A card in Stasis gains a turn counter equal to its cost plus 1. NL Turn counter is reduced by 1 at the start of your turn. NL When the counter reaches 0, it is returned to your hand and becomes 0-cost until played.
Gems can be placed into Sockets in cards at a Rest Site.
Deal 3 damage to attackers, and gain 2 Block when you play a card. Lasts 1 turn.
Skill that summons a Bronze Orb minion and enhances it with effects.
Wards are #b0 cost Skill cards which provide Block, and Exhaust.
Reduce the turn counter of a card in Stasis by 1. If the card now costs 0, return it to your hand.
